konata.settings.title: Konata Mod Settings
konata.settings.mode.tooltip:
§lRandomized:§r will render a picture of Konata with a random size and position with the specified delay.

§lJumpscare:§r will show a fullscreen Konata jumpscare with a sound effect if you get lucky.
konata.settings.chance.tooltip: Adjusts the chance of getting a Konata jumpscare during gameplay.
konata.settings.delay.tooltip:
Adjusts the delay between each randomly generated Konata.

On the §lJumpscare§r mode, it defines the amount of time Konata is shown in the screen.
